vat_eu_business.message: We have identified you as EU business customer, you can order VAT-exempt in our shop now.

vat_oc_business.message: We have identified you as business customer.

invalid_vat.message: Your VAT-ID is invalid, please check the syntax.

vat_syntax_error.message: The given VAT-ID is invalid, please check the syntax. If this error remains please contact us directly to register a customer account with exempt from taxation with us.

vat_vies_unavailable.message: Currently the European VIES service is unavailable, but you can proceed with your registration and validate later from your customer account management.

vat_memberstate_unavailable.message: Currently the member state service is unavailable, we could not validate your VAT-ID to issue an VAT exempt order. Anyhow you can proceed with your registration and validate later in your customer account.

vat_general_error.message: There was an error processing your request. If this error remains please contact us directly to register a customer account with exempt from taxation with us.

vat_validation_waiting.message: Please wait while we validate your VAT-ID

vat_syntax_error_cc.message: Please enter your VAT-ID including the ISO-3166 two letter country code.

adminhtml_invalid_vat.message: The VAT-ID is invalid, please check the syntax.

adminhtml_vies_unavailable.message: Currently the European VIES service is unavailable.

adminhtml_ms_unavailable.message: Currently the member state service is unavailable.

adminhtml_please_declare.message: Please declare a VAT number before validating.
